statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 10
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 50 AND product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT MAX(stock_level) AS highest_stock FROM inventory_management;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE price < 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_level >= 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 5 ORDER BY stock_level ASC, price DESC

SELECT products.product_name, transactions.quantity, transactions.transaction_date FROM products INNER JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE transactions.quantity > 5 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, category, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT p.name, s.quantity_sold, su.update_date FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id JOIN stock_updates su ON p.id = su.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 10 AND su.updated_quantity < 50;
SELECT s.sale_date, p.name, s.quantity_sold FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.id ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, sum(s.quantity_sold) AS total_sales FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_sales > 100;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM stock_levels WHERE current_stock < 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(contact_person) > 10 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, o.order_date FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE DATE(o.order_date) = '2022-01-15';

SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, st.current_stock FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN stock_levels st ON p.product_id = st.product_id WHERE st.current_stock < 50;
SELECT t.transaction_id, o.order_id, t.total_price FROM transactions t JOIN orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id WHERE t.total_price > 100 ORDER BY t.total_price DESC LIMIT 3;
